alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 3:55PM EDT until April 19 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton and Southern Coos Counties. In Maine, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to Noon EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts will be strongest immediately northwest of the White Mountains.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos
